I'll wait for peeps to test this but the size sounds about right. Borderlands 1 was also around 5gb when it first came out. Only when all the DLCs were added it became around 10-12gb.

For those who haven't tested yet, if this is the set of pre-load files from the skidrow site, then it is lacking the audio files. When characters talk in-game (not in cutscenes) there is no audio or subtitles.
